CustomField.description: "Indicates the nature of the transaction when it is first created, based on quantity changes. Sale = A positive quantity transaction. Reduction = A partial reduction in quantity. Decommission = A full reduction in quantity"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: "Indicates the nature of the transaction when it is first created, based on quantity changes. Sale = A positive quantity transaction. Reduction = A partial reduction in quantity. Decommission = A full reduction in quantity"
CustomField.label: Transaction Type
